original: 《 附屬建物 》據點空地可以建設附屬建物，每個附屬建物有不同的功能，會間接的影響據點乃至國家的發展。大興民生或窮兵黷武？國家發展的前中後期，也應適度調整，且看主公決策！
text: "Accessory Buildings" The open space of a stronghold can be used to construct accessory buildings. Each accessory building has different functions, which will indirectly affect the development of the stronghold and even the country. Great prosperous people's livelihood or relentless military force? In the early, middle and late stages of national development, appropriate adjustments should also be made, depending on the decision of the master!
